title: Credit Suisse Plans a Big Retreat From Wall Street
description: Shares in the Swiss banking giant tumbled after its executive team laid out the details of a long-awaited restructuring plan.
dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Ravi Mattu, Bernhard Warner, Vivian Giang, Sarah Kessler, Stephen Gandel, Michael J. de la Merced, Lauren Hirsch and Ephrat Livni
